object.name: WebhookInfo
object.description: Describes the current status of a webhook.
object.html_description: Describes the current status of a webhook.
object.rst_description: Describes the current status of a webhook.

annotations.description: Webhook URL, may be empty if webhook is not set up
annotations.html_description: Webhook URL, may be empty if webhook is not set up
annotations.rst_description: Webhook URL, may be empty if webhook is not set up
annotations.name: url

annotations.description: True, if a custom certificate was provided for webhook certificate checks
annotations.html_description: True, if a custom certificate was provided for webhook certificate checks
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if a custom certificate was provided for webhook certificate checks
annotations.name: has_custom_certificate

annotations.description: Unix time for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unix time for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unix time for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.name: last_error_date

annotations.description: Error message in human-readable format for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.html_description: Optional. Error message in human-readable format for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Error message in human-readable format for the most recent error that happened when trying to deliver an update via webhook
annotations.name: last_error_message

annotations.description: Unix time of the most recent error that happened when trying to synchronize available updates with Telegram datacenters
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unix time of the most recent error that happened when trying to synchronize available updates with Telegram datacenters
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unix time of the most recent error that happened when trying to synchronize available updates with Telegram datacenters
annotations.name: last_synchronization_error_date

annotations.description: The maximum allowed number of simultaneous HTTPS connections to the webhook for update delivery
annotations.html_description: Optional. The maximum allowed number of simultaneous HTTPS connections to the webhook for update delivery
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The maximum allowed number of simultaneous HTTPS connections to the webhook for update delivery
annotations.name: max_connections

annotations.description: A list of update types the bot is subscribed to. Defaults to all update types except chat_member
annotations.html_description: Optional. A list of update types the bot is subscribed to. Defaults to all update types except chat_member
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. A list of update types the bot is subscribed to. Defaults to all update types except *chat_member*
annotations.name: allowed_updates
